README:  
TileScape Collection â€“ Stylized 2D Isometric Tileset
ğŸŒ Complete Environment Bundle (Jungle, Desert, Winter, Magic, Lava)

ğŸ§¾ About This Collection
TileScape Collection is a complete 2D isometric tileset bundle crafted for Unity developers.
This collection contains five distinct biomes, each designed with a stylized, modular approach for creating immersive, optimized environments in a variety of game genres.

ğŸ“¦ Included Biomes
1. ğŸŒ´ Jungle
2. ğŸœï¸ Desert
3. â„ï¸ Winter
4. ğŸ”® Magic
5. ğŸŒ‹ Lava

Each biome includes:
- ğŸ›£ï¸ Modular, grid-aligned road tiles (250+ total)
- ğŸŒ¿ Decorative props and terrain details (550+ total)
- ğŸ–¼ï¸ High-resolution and low-resolution PNGs
- ğŸ§© Organized folders per biome and resolution
- ğŸ§ª Demo scenes to preview usage

ğŸ§± Tile Details
- All textures use power-of-two dimensions (e.g., 128x128, 256x512)
- Designed for Unity Tilemap or custom grid systems
- Seamless tile transitions for natural-looking maps

ğŸ› ï¸ Usage Instructions
1. Import the package into your Unity project
2. Explore folders by biome and resolution (High / Low)
3. Use PNGs directly in scenes or build your own tilemaps
4. Check demo scenes for usage examples and inspiration

ğŸ§© Compatibility
- Unity 2021.3 LTS and above
- Compatible with URP & Built-in Render Pipeline
- Works on mobile and desktop platforms
- No scripts or custom shaders included
